targets.query:
// Daily light waste - Kitchen
// Measures hours where lights are on but room is vacant

light_states = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "light.kitchen")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value == "on" then 1.0 else 0.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

presence_states = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "binary_sensor.presence_kitchen")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value == "on" then 0.0 else 1.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

join(tables: {light: light_states, presence: presence_states}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value_light * r._value_presence,
      _field: "waste"
  }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 60.0}))
  |> yield(name: "kitchen_waste")

// Daily light waste - Hallway

light_states = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "light.hallway")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value == "on" then 1.0 else 0.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

// Hallway doesn't have direct presence sensor, use any FP2 zone activity
presence_states = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /presence_sensor_fp2.*presence_sensor/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value == "on" then 1.0 else 0.0}))
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> max()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value > 0.0 then 0.0 else 1.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

join(tables: {light: light_states, presence: presence_states}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value_light * r._value_presence,
      _field: "waste"
  }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 60.0}))
  |> yield(name: "hallway_waste")
